Title: Newer Elements of Our Defense
Writer: John Fawcett (created by), Graeme Manson (created by), Russ Cochrane, Chris Roberts (executive story editor), Lynn Coady (story), Hannah Cheesman (story), Elize Morgan (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Peter Rowley (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Andrew De Angelis (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Kim Coghill (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Jeff Detsky (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Adam Higgs (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Alex Levine (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Rebecca Sernasie (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Bob Mackowycz Jr. (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident)

Plot: Sarah's fate hangs in the balance as she tries to save her sister.
